Scene:
The Kamo River Bank
(Kamo tsutsumi / 加茂堤)

Play: Sugawara's Secrets of Calligraphy (菅原伝授手習鑑)

Production: September 1970

– Click image to view.



Narrators (Tayu):

Toyotake Shimatayū VIII (豊竹嶋大夫 (八))



Shamisen Players:

Takezawa Danjirō IV (see also Takezawa Danshichi) (竹澤団二郎 (四))
